token.text1: Magnet DAO ($MAG) is our native governance token which will be used to govern the DAO. The DAO will have voting power for major protocol decisions and treasury management.
token.text2: $MAG is launching natively on Avalanche (AVAX) and will be available for swapping on Trader Joe. We plan to expand to cross-chain in the future.

totalSupply.title: Total Supply
totalSupply.text: Magnet DAO will have a maximum supply of 1 million $MAG. At launch, Total Circulating Supply will be 750,000 $MAG. Total Diluted Supply will be 1,000,000 million $MAG.

distribution.title: Distribution
distribution.b0: 37.5% of $MAGâ€™s Total Diluted Supply will be sold via a fair launch:
distribution.b1: Investors will be able to contribute USDC to our launchpad - the amount of AVAX contributed will establish a price for $MAG token
distribution.b3: Price will equal amount of $ raised / # of shares for sale (75% * 1 million= 750K tokens)
distribution.b4: For example: if we receive $5M of contributions to the pool, implied price of $MAG upon close of the funding round will be equal to $5M / 750k = $6.666 per MAG
distribution.text1:
20% of tokens will be held by the dev team. 
These tokens will vest linearly over 2 years. 
5% of tokens will be used for partnerships, promotions, etc.
